aka: De vuelta a casa, salvados de la extinción(墨西哥)

cast.name: 克莱尔·丹尼斯 Claire Danes

this_title: Back From the Brink: Saved From Extinction
trans_title: De vuelta a casa, salvados de la extinción(墨西哥)
introduction: Experience on the giant screen the remarkable true story of three animal species rescued from the brink of extinction. Join this amazing adventure to save California's enchanting Channel Island Fox, China's fabled Golden Monkey and the wondrous migrating crabs of Christmas Island. Discover successful, heartfelt and ingenious human efforts to rescue endangered species around the world.
chinese_title: Back From the Brink: Saved From Extinction
